title: Privacy Policy
intro: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how MyAZStore collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you browse or make purchases on our website.

sections.heading: 1. Information We Collect
content: We collect only the information that is necessary to process orders, improve user experience, and provide support.
This may include:
- Name, phone number, email address and shipping address
- Order details, transactional data and payment confirmation
- Device information such as browser type, IP address, and cookies
- Login cookies to maintain your user session securely

sections.heading: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: We use your personal data to:
- Process and deliver your orders
- Provide order updates and customer support
- Improve website performance and user experience
- Prevent fraudulent activities and ensure account security

sections.heading: 3. Data Sharing & Third Parties
content: We do not sell your data. We only share required information with trusted third-party services such as:
- Payment gateways (for secure transactions)
- Courier and logistics partners (for shipping)
- Analytics tools (to improve performance)
These partners follow industry-standard data protection norms.

sections.heading: 4. Cookies & Tracking
content: We use cookies to:
- Keep you logged in safely
- Remember items in your cart
- Improve site performance and personalisation
You may disable cookies in your browser, but some features may stop working.

sections.heading: 5. Data Protection & Security
content: We follow strict security measures to protect your personal information.
All sensitive data is encrypted and stored securely.
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only.

sections.heading: 6. Your Rights
content: You can request to:
- View the personal data we hold
- Update incorrect information
- Delete your account
- Opt-out of marketing communications
To exercise these rights, contact us using the details below.

sections.heading: 7. Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy as needed.
Updates will be posted on this page with the latest effective date.

sections.heading: 8. Contact Information
content: For privacy-related queries, contact us:
Email: support@myazstore.shop
